M

main(String[]) - Static method in class gruppe.irc.IRCClient
 
MessageEvent - Class in gruppe.irc
Class used to pass information about a message between the IRCConnection class and its listeners.
MessageEvent(String, String, String, Object) - Constructor for class gruppe.irc.MessageEvent
Constructor for creating new MessageEvent objects.
MessageHandler - Class in gruppe.irc
Class made for handling all message-events that occurs in our client
MessageListener - Interface in gruppe.irc.messageListeners
This interface must be implemented by all message listeners to be attached to an IRCConnection object.
messageReceived(MessageEvent) - Method in class gruppe.irc.messageListeners.GlobalMessageListener
Method to receive messages from the server and print them on standard output.
messageReceived(MessageEvent) - Method in interface gruppe.irc.messageListeners.MessageListener
Method to be called to notify the listener of a new message from the IRCConnection object.
messageReceived(MessageEvent) - Method in class gruppe.irc.messageListeners.PingListener
Method receives messages from IRCConnection object and checks if it is a PING request from the server.
messages - Static variable in class gruppe.irc.IRCClient
